lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I can give only a small amount, but small amounts from many can add up to enough capital to make big changes in the lives of people who have very little.

lenders.name: Sahil
lenders.loan_because: Giving a loan to this cause is better than not , and anything good in this world is worth believing in and KIVA has figured out a way to do this good thing in the right way.
lenders.occupational_info: I design internet services for an advertising company in New York City.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: A sense of community is important to me, whether that community is the one I live in or half way around the world.  I want to help out where I can and I'd like to think someone I don't know might do the same for me if needed one day.  I also want my daughter to understand and appreciate the importance of sharing, contributing, giving, and receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a marketing/communcations company, but my true passion is writing.  I'm currently working on my first novel.

lenders.name: gwen & mark
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I must.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: sooner or later everyone needs a helping hand.

lenders.name: Matt & Hailey
lenders.loan_because: We believe much has been invested in us. It drives us to invest in others.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I let my students select the recipient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher at Gonzaga Prep in Spokane, WA, USA

lenders.name: Houston
lenders.loan_because: I live for it.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.occupation: Kiva Fellow  Prev: Guardianship & Trust manager
lenders.loan_because: I believe access to credit can be a driving force in entrepreneurial activity and skill development.  These can lead to better living standards for all.  I further appreciate the opportunity to "invest" in real people as opposed to corporations which have seemed to thrive on a lack of transparency in recent years.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in as a small business consultant, non-profit controller, and fiduciary manager for guardianships and trusts.  In the winter of 2009 I worked with Edpyme Alternativa as a Kiva Fellow.  Currently I am an MBA candidate.

lenders.name: Rose Garrett
lenders.loan_because: What we may see as a small loan makes a BIG difference for a struggling entrepreneur across the world.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is possible to eliminate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to cope with health problems.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I support progress and positive action.

lenders.name: Abdülmecit
lenders.loan_because: so little here helps so much there.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people who really need that "hand Up" to help them succeed.  My little amount may help that person to suceed.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea as I like the fact that these people are working their way to an improved living situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide insurance that pays legal bills when people who run businesses are taken to court.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I would like to pass on the fortune I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I approve Corporate Credit and Mortgages and assist with bringing new people into providing our loans.

lenders.name: Conrad
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: much has been given to me.  The least I can do is return the favor.

lenders.name: Debora
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky...have enough to share...as an atheist, don't see a supernatural being taking care of the desperately poor...we make our own purpose in life and helping others when we can makes life meaningful.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a break
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a student of religion and when I graduate I plan to work in charitable organizations and help my parents buy a farm.

lenders.name: Tula
lenders.loan_because: nothing feels better than helping others

lenders.name: Christopher Daggett
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy, like collecting jelly beans. I also loan to support wominnovation (http://nyti.ms/aTDcFu).
lenders.occupational_info: my organization applies research insights from behavioral economics to invent fresh solutions to the world's toughest social problems.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is vital to every business' success.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been in business for myself for over 25 years developing computer software.

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: i want to help others improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a resturant

lenders.name: Rachel and Sam Davis
lenders.loan_because: Love breaking down the barriers.
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: my daughters gave this to me as a gift for Mother's Day.  What a wonderful tribute to what I hope I have taught them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with churches of all shapes and sizes helping them to be the best they can be.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It is about kharma...good things will happen to me when I do good things for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the distribution of auto parts,for the biggest car company in the world.

lenders.name: Vancouver Youth Model UN
lenders.loan_because: actions speak louder than words. Our Model UN programme seized the opportunity to not only talk about changing the world, but make a difference by acting on our beliefs.
lenders.occupational_info: The Model UN club at our school hosts the city's only United Nations simulation for junior high students (Gr. 7-9) in order to engage them in the activities of the UN and its committees and agencies.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I believe if the world is to become a better place to live then we all need to start helping more.  No one person can do it alone.  Perhaps by lending a helping hand we can begin to achieve some type of harmony .

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It´s a shame poverty still exists in the world.  I sincerly hope , that these loans will help people in the developing countries, to a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I´m in the insurancebusiness, helping people with insurances for their households, cars and so on.    I live in the southern part of Sweden.

lenders.name: Rajan
lenders.loan_because: I hope this will help make someone's environment less hostile and stressful.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing circuits for wireless devices.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I think micro financing is a good way to give a fair chance to the less fortunate people in the world

lenders.name: isabelle
lenders.loan_because: because i'm not there anymore. But my friends instead of buying flowers decided to give some money to Kiva.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 12 and 13 year old students how to be successful learners.  My students have average or above intellects, but have learning issues such as dyslexia (reading difficulties) or dyscalculia (math difficulties).

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: cuz I want to be nice
lenders.occupational_info: I like math best.  Becket is my best friend.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: Twenty-five bucks and you outsource all the hard work. What's not to like?

lenders.name: Bridges
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a bridge to a better place sometime
lenders.occupational_info: Charity

lenders.name: Brandy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to do better for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites, brochures, business cards, and other materials to advertise businesses.

lenders.name: Marlena
lenders.loan_because: I can--and so can my students and clients. That's why I give them Kiva gift certificates!
lenders.occupational_info: Athena Mentor helps international students prepare winning applications to top US colleges and MBA programs.

lenders.name: giovanni
lenders.loan_because: perche' posso aiutare qualcuno messo male in giro per il mondo senza alzarmi dalla sedia sperando che si ricordino di me in caso un giorno fossi messo male io

lenders.name: JmeKellyAlmaTimKyle
lenders.loan_because:
We want to connect with others around the world offering them a chance to work towards their goals, as well as a hand of friendship.

We love learning about different countries, the people who live there, and what their lives are like (including occupations and aspirations).

Business loans create greater stability, confidence, and self-reliance in individuals and families: We have faith in the vast capabilities of our borrowers to meet their goals.

lenders.name: Ziv
lenders.loan_because: Foregoing a few dozen dollars in interest I would have earned in a savings account in order to help raise the standard of living of people earning no more than a few dollars a day--just makes sense.  Supporting small enterprises is a necessary component of our efforts to bring the very basic human essentials to the developing world.

lenders.name: The CAG Family
lenders.loan_because: We want connect with others around the world and learn about who they are, what they do and where they live.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family of four. We work in the fields of technology and teaching.

lenders.name: Faith UCC
lenders.loan_because: Because, "as you have done to the least of these my brethren you have done it unto me."
lenders.occupational_info: We believe in: continuing testament, extravagent welcome, changing lives, growing in faith, hope and love of God and neighbor.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: Those attempting to better their economic position with personal initiative should have the opportunity.

lenders.name: Kristi & Jim
lenders.occupational_info:
She is an attorney
He is a marketing exec
We have two great kids

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children the value of helping others and to understand that to whom much is given much is expected.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: i should. we all should.
lenders.occupational_info: i love, i learn, i teach, i laugh. besides raising my son, i take pictures, i sew, i paint, i cook.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I have been loaned money which has helped me start my life. I want to repay the favor to people who deserve the chance to succeed. Kiva allows that chance to see and know who you are lending to with confidence. Giving a small amount of money that means very little to me but a lot to another person is what makes lending through Kiva so great. Change makes Change!

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: The best way to help a community is to target the people who can do  the most with the money.  I believe that the system of microfinancing supported  by KIVA does this as each is individual is chosen through their local community.  By loaning instead of donating, I can keep using the money to help people.  A loan does not foster dependency.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach chemistry and science to teenagers

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do to directly have an impact on the world.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: Playing poker does not do much for the world we live in :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be a small winner at card games that I love to play.  When the money I make at the tables helps others to grow and and achieve their goals as well, I enjoy it even more!

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: Because it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me, so I should help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I design electronics for jet aircraft.

lenders.name: Shauna
lenders.loan_because: There is an old Chinese proverb:  "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." ~  I'm lending the man the money to buy the fishing pole and tackle.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful that I can provide for my family and I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people invest their money.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I know how fortunate I am.  Kiva gives me the opportunity to share my good fortune.  For me, it is about acknowledging my blessings, recognizing the importance of people, and doing my part to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise 3 children to be responsible, appreciative, and aware of the world around them.  In my free time, I volunteer to conserve our precious natural resources.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I feel entrepreneurs around the world who have not been as fortunate as I deserve some assistance so that they may succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a business caring for children with complicated medical problems in 2 group homes.

lenders.name: Kevin & Carol
lenders.loan_because: I admire anyone who tries to improve thier lives through hard work.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupational_info: I am a design Engineer for an Electrical utility in northern Canada.

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way help someone who only needs a hand to get started.  I just looked at my loan history - how exciting to see how many lives a small contribution can touch!
lenders.occupational_info: I finally finished my Medical Transcriptionist training and started a new job, along with taking care of my 3 kids, 2 cats and a dog.

lenders.name: Peggy H.
lenders.loan_because: a volunteer group I belong to in my community gave me money to use with Kiva to honor the memory of my brother, James Burke.  He was a family man first and also a successful businessman.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a trauma therapist.  I use a type of psychotherapy called EMDR which helps people process and heal from traumatic experiences.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I just really want to.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am a full time student in Los Angeles. I plan to one day work for a company such as kiva, and actually travel to other countries so that I can people like you!

lenders.name: F.K.C.
lenders.loan_because: thou...we really don't know yet how this can benefit others but we think it's cool to start sharing & reaching out early in our lives...
lenders.occupational_info: ...enjoying kid's life bringing joy & happiness in our family, and we wish to all kids around the world too :)

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the positive possibilities of helping those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and test computer chips. I am a single mom and live in beautiful Colorado with my young son.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple way to make a small positive change for someone else far away.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make our public transportation system work better.

lenders.name: Habitat Threads
lenders.loan_because:
1) We believe that our company should be philanthropic in order to be fully socially conscious.
2) Rather than blindly donate, we are helping people to pull themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We make socially conscious clothing for children.

lenders.name: Romeo & me
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows me to be a one-person foreign aid campaign.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to prepare science/engineering grant proposals and technical papers.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I like to help fellow small business entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Risto & Liz
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to give people a hand up instead of a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange financing for equipment sales. Liz is a flight attendant

lenders.name: Wright Family
lenders.loan_because: We all need to be concerned about the world and its people.  Not just our  local area but other regions of the planet.  Also we felt this would be a good way to educate our daughters about other people and their lives.    They have each chosen their own individuals to support and we spread our moneys among 4 different individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Biology instructor at a local Community College, I have been teaching for over 25 years.  Our daughters are in fifth and tenth grade.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: it makes me smile.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is the coolest organization ever!
lenders.occupational_info: I do grassroots marekting programs for an eco-friendly , hip soap company.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because:
Microfinance is one of the few broadly successful strategies for helping the poor. 
And it is easy
lenders.occupational_info: I like my work ;)

lenders.name: Harri
lenders.loan_because: I find that women are playing an important role in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm  importing small tractors for private and professional users

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I like to support people who are willing to create their own lives and better their own circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I run my own business called Crystal Clear Sound.  I'm a musician who plays guitar and dobro (also known as a resonator guitar - see my photo).  I'm also a live sound engineer who operates sound systems at events and clubs and I work to record other artists in my recording studio.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I aspire to make the world a better place for all.
lenders.occupational_info: Working to end hunger in the state of Texas.

lenders.name: Heljä
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and my husband abundantly, and now we want to help others.

lenders.name: Luis Pedro
lenders.loan_because: I want to do what I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am pursuing a PhD in computational biology at CMU. This Summer (2010), I will be in Mozambique helping out HIV related organisation [http://beiraproject.org].

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I know from experience how hard it is to start a small business with too little funds, just hard work alone often isn't enough. I hope to help in giving some people that little 'push' in the back.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a professional photographer, mainly active in covering cultural events (theather, dance, concerts, ...)

lenders.name: Harri
lenders.loan_because:
It is important for those of us who are fortunate to remember those less fortunate. 
What is a small amount to us makes a huge difference to others.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful way to help others help themselves!

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that it is the obligation of people who have been fortunate to help those who are not.  I have been deeply touched by the efforts encouraged by Oprah and President Clinton, and am convinced that we can eradicate destitution in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help create software that moves money around college campuses. I get excited about ways to create software more efficiently. 

Apart from that, I train for triathlons, I go to cultural and political events downtown, I read books from my local library, I recycle, and I love to travel.

lenders.name: Charles McPhate
lenders.loan_because: I believe improving the standard of living south of the border is the only way to solve the immigration "problem" many in this country complain about.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: My husband Paul and I have travelled extensively and appreciate the people of other countries. This is the least we can do to help those who are trying so hard to help themselves.

lenders.name: Defrim
lenders.loan_because: I need financial assistance to continue my studies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, studying medical school at University of Prishtina

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: A rising tide raises all boats.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a company that rents the use of beach chairs and large shade umbrellas to vacationers on the beach.

lenders.name: Petri & Marja
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, people work so hard and if they could just get a little help it makes a world of difference. It does my heart good.
lenders.occupational_info: I help dr's and techs with medical care for animals. Animals are dependent on us and they get sick just like us.

lenders.name: Sari ja Petja
lenders.loan_because: Helping women entrepreneurs in 3rd world makes the whole world a better place to be.

lenders.name: Dan Bretl
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I think up digital things, I make them, I take photos, I travel, I try to create as much as I can in this world.

lenders.loan_because: MY  SCHOOL  I  STARTED  NEEDS  BIG  SUPPORT  FOR  GROWTH
lenders.occupational_info: AN  ESTABLISHMENT  WITH  A FUTURE (  A  HUMBLE  BEGGINING , GLBAL  SUCESS)

lenders.name: Anu
lenders.loan_because: I love helping and giving back to those less fortunate. My heart goes out to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I participate in a program that helps save the environment one day at a time.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I am able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I study history and political science.  I see this service as a way to help others out.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give, and support others. We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Erik & Maria
lenders.loan_because: Want to make a change

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I just had to try this and NIcholas Kristof's influence was too great.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help university students achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Everett Rotary
lenders.loan_because: World Community Service is an important mission of Rotary and Rotarians everywhere.  Helping others around the world to improve their standard of living through enterprise fits this mission.
lenders.occupational_info: Rotary International is the largest volunteer service organization in the world - over 1 million members.  Made up of business people, Rotary Clubs throughout the world strive to improve their local communities as well as communities around the world through the ideal of "service above self."   Visit  www.rotary.org to learn more.

lenders.name: Nicola Kiri
lenders.loan_because: I see huge potential within kiva.org.  I like the idea of helping someone to become more self-sufficient and successful in their own business, and believe it will help them a lot over the long-term rather than a small donation to some worldwide charity.  And most importantly, I have a social conscience!
lenders.occupational_info:
One of my favourite quotes: 
"Never look down on somebody unless you're helping him up" - Jesse Jackson

lenders.name: Jinesh
lenders.loan_because: 'Vasudaiva Kutumbakam' - Whole world is one family
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a software company. We design software to help doctors with electronic medical records and patients with patient portal. Our software helps doctor become paperless, increase efficiency and productivity. It also helps patients enhance their communication with their doctors and improve outcome measures of their respective health.

lenders.name: Matt and Charmaine
lenders.loan_because: Loans have helped us and we just want to spread the help around.
lenders.occupational_info:
Matt writes computer programs that helps make other people's jobs a little bit easier.
Charmaine is a lawyer who helps the state recover tax money from fraudulent tax transactions.

lenders.name: Amber & Jack
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to make a positive difference in somebody else's life

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: There's finally a way to loan person-to-person on the other side of the world, rather than to a big, faceless organization. It's empowering to me and to the person I'm helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I write marketing materials to help businesses grow.

lenders.name: The W Family
lenders.loan_because: It's something we do as a family.  We hope to connect with people and life experiences that are different from ours.  It's a great way to give and care about people all over the world.

lenders.name: Nigel
lenders.loan_because: what better satisfaction is there in helping others empower themselves & their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop & create children's licensed product.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am self employed and I know how important working capital is in creating a successful business.  I respect  all of these people trying to make a better life for themselves by asking for a hand not a hand out.

lenders.name: Wesley
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: start businesses that make people happy

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and to spread good fortune.

lenders.name: Curtis
lenders.loan_because: " Give someone a fish and they eat for a day.  Teach them to fish and they eat forever."   Everyone needs a helping hand. What better way to help people help themselves ?

lenders.name: Andres + Emily
lenders.loan_because: we can.

lenders.name: Ernie
lenders.loan_because:
it seems like a great way to help people help themselves and their families.

it's not charity - it's giving people a chance and a start.

it is efficient and it does not take much money to make a difference

lenders.name: Sven
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in helping people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell health-related products on the internet - this way I help people improve their health. At the same time I help small businesses to develop additional income streams.

lenders.loan_because: I NEED A LOAN FOR FARMING
lenders.occupational_info: I NEED A LOAN  FOR FARMING TO CARE FOR ORPHANS IN GHANA

lenders.occupational_info: Politics and economics

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: "Teach a man to fish..." or in this case, give him the means by which to buy a rod!!
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly writing and editing... and talking about what to write, what not to write and how to edit it!

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are motivated to help themselves

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I can and I like to reach out to the world..
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a city school  - I also do environmental work

lenders.name: C & D - Seoul
lenders.loan_because: We are currently able to do so.  It was not always that way.  It may not be that way again.  But now we can, so we do.
lenders.occupational_info: Essential existentialism.  We are who we are for as long as we are, and so is our work and play.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.occupational_info: Journalist, radio broadcaster

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I love the small business spirit and if I can help someone achieve success then that means that I am doing what I'm supposed to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Real Estate agents in our company helping them to prospect, brand themselves, and generate more business.  I help them develop business plans and differentiate themselves from the competition.

lenders.name: Trey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to achieve financial stability and witness personal growth.  I have spent over 2 years throughout the middle east, Iraq, Kuwait, etc, and there are many people that want better lives for their families and just dont have the resources for this!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computer networks just like the one you are using.  I make sure that people can access information throughout the web!!

lenders.name: Kary
lenders.loan_because: I hope to be able to help other people and Kiva was recommended to my by my brother and sister-in-law.
lenders.occupational_info: I help ensure new pharmaceutical drugs are safe for humans.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help someone I do not know in a place that I may never get to and expect no gain in return beyond the chance to do it again.

lenders.name: Finnella
lenders.loan_because: People who want to make life better for themselves and their familes should have a chance to do just that.  Kiva allows me to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because:
"We can all do small things with great love, and together we can do something wonderful."
                                   - Mother Teresa

lenders.name: gmichaela
lenders.loan_because: sometimes it takes a small loan to get your dreams off the ground
lenders.occupational_info: use my skills and talents to help others

lenders.name: Tyler Smith
lenders.occupational_info: When not studying, I manage and advise political and legislative campaigns.  My work has many facets, including data analysis, political messaging, policy development, fundraising, copy writing, and human resources management.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The idea of micro loans seems like a fabulous idea to help people who need a helping hand and are having trouble getting started and are not looking for government assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a company testing people for possible heart disease and stroke

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: My parents were refugees who were given a chance to rebuild their lives with help from the international community. Now I would like to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people when they are sick, and try to keep them healthy when they are well.

lenders.name: Diane, Jim, Nic and Marina
lenders.loan_because: Diane and Jim both served in the Peace Corps - Diane in Honduras (87-90) and Jim in the Philippines (mid 80s).  We believe in helping people to help themselves and want to carry on that tradition with our 2 children, Nicolas and Marina.
lenders.occupational_info: Diane works for the U.S. Government in education creating training programs for employees.  Jim runs his own home remodeling/repair business.

lenders.name: Jolly
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a little help along the way
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time intellectual property (trademark) attorney for a cosmetics company and part-time muse.

lenders.name: Lizella

lenders.loan_because: I love helping others.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the potential and like the interpersonal aspect of micro-lending.

lenders.name: Rebecca

lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office supporting attorneys with computers and other forms of technology.

lenders.name: Shevy

lenders.name: Alan & Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: I have huge respect for people who are creative and fully committed to their ideas.  I believe entrepreneurs are those kinds of people.  I would love to bless those in return for the blessings God has given to me and my family.  -Sheryl
lenders.occupational_info:
My job is to work with children who have difficulty learning and struggle with some behavioral issues.  

In weekly volunteering I believe that life should be lived addressing not only global issues of poverty but also local issues.  I volunteer with Habitat for Humanity and my husband and I have started a charity for local concerns called Serve the City.  

Poverty comes in all forms; in some way our lives can make a difference for those who suffer or are trying to make a way for themselves and their families by simple acts of service.  Kiva offers a fantastic opportunity to make that small difference over and over again.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I am the privileged descendant of  poor immigrants. I owe it to my ancestors and my children to make the world somehow better
lenders.occupational_info: Businessperson

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to help others in a meaningful and direct way.  I can think of no better way than helping others around the world fulfill their dreams.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can still afford to.
lenders.occupational_info: I make powerpoints and excel spreadsheets.  Over and over and over....

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I want to.  This is the work that will change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a portrait artist and poet .  Faces are what I love.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I  want the opportunity to help someone in need. I chose Kiva because each month my small monthly donation of $25 goes directly to that person with out the adminstration costs and overhead of a larger organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I write children's books both fiction and non fiction for chldren ages 2-12 years old. Currently I am producing a series of small films for children  who are homeschooled. These 3-4 minute films  that are shown on the Internet.

lenders.name: RiKa
lenders.loan_because: My father  got me intersted in all things global and gave me a gift certificate to make a loan through Kiva...
lenders.occupational_info: I am presently writing an Encylopedia of American Toys.  It examines the relationship of toys to American society.

lenders.name: Christopher

lenders.occupational_info: I use the Internet to tell customers about the products and services of the company I work for.

lenders.name: LRN

I want to play my part by contributing to the capital requirements.

Kiva's goal resonates with mine.

lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate that I am able to.

lenders.name: Gavin
lenders.loan_because: Like many others on Kiva, I have more than I need and want to share with others. I know that Kiva field partners require heavy interest from borrowers, however I hope that the loans help people to achieve greater wealth. In turn, I hope this wealth reduces the urge to take too much from the environment. In almost every case, a well preserved environment is worth more money to people who live there than a damaged environment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a global social media manager at ABB. I've also been an English teacher in South Korea, a journalist, a blogger and an editor. Join me on Twitter https://twitter.com/#!/gavinhudson and say hi from Kiva! :)

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I feel really bad about the enormous economic inequalities in the world today and the terrible hardships these cause. I hope that my loans can help make a positive difference in someone's life and the lives of their loved ones. One day we will all live in a better world, and it is the people who connect through organisations such as Kiva that will make it happen.

lenders.occupational_info: I live to give myself to a cause that is bigger than me.

lenders.occupational_info: I own a residential and commercial  real estate brokerage in Houston, TX. Turbo Realty

You can immediately know how they will gain self-sufficiency and in such a small way you can help many improve theirs lives in a way by which they would otherwise go without.

We also teach students and interns how to care for wildlife and their natural habitats in their communities. Recently, we created a new online Education Outreach Program for teachers and students in schools and colleges everywhere.

I make lots of stock investments expecting a $ return.
Kiva is different & good as an investment directly in people lives. When one is lifted up we all are.

lenders.name: Kristoffer

lenders.name: Al
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people; Just the thought of helping others is more satisfying then doing nothing at all.  Giving, Sharing or even lending a helping hand can be very gratifying, It also sends a good message, the right message that people do care around the World.

When I am just ashes in a County Clare breeze, I hope that my photographs will serve as a gentle reminder of the places I visited and the friendly faces I knew along the way.

lenders.loan_because: "A small financial sacrifice on my part opens enormous opportunities to the needy."
lenders.occupational_info: My husband Ernest opened this account 2 years before he passed away at age 45 of Glioblastoma Multiforme (brain cancer). He was the most spirit-filled and generous person I have ever had the privilege of knowing.  To honor his memory, I have added to the total funds and have continued to lend to benefit other widows and many people in need around the world. 51 loans to date on behalf of my dearly loved husband.

lenders.name: Meg and Michael
lenders.loan_because: we want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with folks in their 70's, 80's, and 90's, helping them reach their maximum potential and enjoy a high quality of life.

lenders.name: Mitchell Family
lenders.loan_because: Lending through KIVA ensures that every cent we loan makes it's way to the intended recipient.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others with a hand up as I have received from friends & family in my past....Like the movie Pay it Forward! It makes the heart feel good to do a small part in helping others in this BIG world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a payroll manager for a privately held infomercial company. In my off time, I raise alpaca as a side business.

lenders.name: Harsh Pradhan
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that the way to truly change the world is through people helping people.A small donation can make a world of difference to people in need. In this country we are so fortunate. Its not asking a lot of anyone to give to those in need.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: I want to set up sari-sari store in our house to add more income for my family needs. And i want to save money for our basic needs because it is little bit expensive if you buy retail.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sub-distributor entrepreneur selling mineral water to our neighbors and earn 5 pesos per 25 gallons of water. I have a work experience in supermarkets so that it is easy for me to set up a sari-sari store."Tingi-tingi" is popular store here in the Philippines.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
Loan proceeds will go towards the cost of building a one-of-a-kind website I have purchased, (www.seattleISmusic.com). I want to create a new and convenient way for you to discover, experience and aquuire great music. It is going to be a new way for people to be able to discover and find music here in Seattle. A small portion of loan will be used towards marketing costs to help build a powerful new brand.

I have 7 years experience in the radio industry working within marketing/promotions for radio stations all over the US. I would like to take my experience and vision and make it a reality. I have founded my company on 2 personal qualities, PASSION and PERSEVERANCE. If you feel passionate about a particular business and have the fortitude to break down the barriers and redirect as needed, you can indeed do GREAT things!

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: all people need is an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Developing software to help manage trucking and shipping.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We are a family of six and live off less than $40,000 a year.  However we have a roof over our heads and food on the table, if I can help someone else have this I will.  God is good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young children from 6wks to 5 years.  I am an a early education teacher.

lenders.name: McKinsey Family
lenders.loan_because: We would want a way to receive a loan if we needed it, and the Bible teaches us to love our neighbors like ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
The mother teaches people who are blind.
The father maintains the home.
The oldest son works in a factory.
Two sons and two daughters are in school.

lenders.name: Jon, Karlyn and Jack
lenders.loan_because: It's super classy. Microloans>Microphones
lenders.occupational_info:
As a grain trader, I work with local grain farmers to market their crops.
As students we talk during class and occasionally learn things.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: This is the most positive thing I can think of doing for our world economy. Instead of just feeding a black hole non-profit organization, I get to re-loan the same money over and over again to various people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Culinary cook for work, I also like to write.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: If I don't set the right example for my daughter, how will the world ever change
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full time Mom.  It doesn't matter where on earth you live, if you have children, you know what I do with my day, my week, my life.

lenders.name: CKoscielski
lenders.loan_because: I want entrepreneurs all over the world have a fair chance to be successful.

lenders.name: scott@joy
lenders.loan_because:
Exodus 22:25 (New International Version)
 25 "If you lend money to one of my people among you who is needy, do not be like a moneylender; charge him no interest.

Deuteronomy 23:19
Do not charge your brother interest, whether on money or food or anything else that may earn interest.

Leviticus 25:35-37 (New International Version)
 35 " 'If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, help him as you would an alien or a temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you. 36 Do not take interest of any kind [a] from him, but fear your God, so that your countryman may continue to live among you. 37 You must not lend him money at interest or sell him food at a profit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring people into the presence of God through music.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: it feels good and life has been pretty good to me lately.

lenders.name: Shirley&Bill
lenders.loan_because: I've been there.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy capturing special moments for people, whether a newborn or a wedding, it doesn't matter.  I believe every person has a story.

lenders.name: Our 3rd Grade Class
lenders.loan_because: We want to be the change I wish to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are Mr. Wallach's 3rd grade class in Tucson, Arizona. We are always looking for ways that we can have a positive impact on other people...especially those in need.
